CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: b The on / off current ratio ( I on / I off ) were extracted from the linear - regime transfer characteristics.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| I on / I off |

In this paragraph, the only material-related entity mentioned is the "I on / I off" ratio, which refers to the current flowing through a material when it is on versus when it is off.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| I on / I off |

In this paragraph, the only material-related entity mentioned is the "I on / I off" ratio, which refers to the current flowing through a material when it is on versus when it is off. Other entities such as "on / off" and "linear-regime transfer characteristics" do not clearly refer to specific materials.
